msItem.title: VI) Unidentified text
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Two lines on the incipit page of Text I-1; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page of Text I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 177va, l.2: ዘ፫ሰዓት። እኤምኅ፡ አዕጋሪከ፡ በጊዜ፡፫፡ ሰዓት፡ ቅድመ፡ ጲላጦስ፡ ዘቆማ፤ ኢየሱስ፡ ጠቢብ፡ ወንጉሥ፡ ፌማ፤ ዘአድከምከ፡ ኃይለ፡ መስቴማ። ስ። እንዘ፡ ይሰልቡ፡ ልብሰከ፡ ወክዳነከ፡ ፀዓዳ፤ እንተ፡ አልበሱከ፡ ከለሜዳ፤ ኢየሱስ፡ ንጉሠ፡ ይሁዳ።

msItem.title: V) Anqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Two lines on the incipit page of Text I-1; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page of Text I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 173rb, l.14:ውዳሴ፡ ወግናይ፡ ዘእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ቅድስት፡ ወብፅዕት፡ ስብሕት፡ ወቡርክት፡ ክብርት፡ ወልዕልት፡ ዓንቀጸ፡ ብርሃን፡ መዓርገ፡ ሕይወት፡ ወማኅደረ፡ መለኮት፨
msItem.explicit: Fol. 177rb, l.15: ስብሐት፡ ለኪ፡ ኦወላዲተ፡ እግዚአ፡ ኲሉ፡ አኰቴት፡ ወክብር፡ ለአብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፨ ይእዜኒ፡ ወዘልፈኒ፡ ወለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ [fol. 177va]ይክፍለነ፨ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፨

JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 158rb-163vb (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8)

msItem.title: IV) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Two lines on the incipit page of Text I-1; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page of Text I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 163ra, l.1:ውዳሴ፡ ዘእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ዘሰኑይ፨ ፈቀደ፡ እግዚእ፡ ያግዕዞ፡ ለአዳም፡ ሕዙነ፡ ወትኩዘ፡ ልብ፡ ወያግብኦ፡ ኀበ፡ ዘትካት፡ መንበሩ። ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት።
msItem.explicit: Fol. 173rb, l.11: ይጸግወነ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ወምሕረቶ፡ ይስረይ፡ ኀጢአተነ፡ በብዝኀ፡ ምሕረቱ፨ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፨

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 231-251 (LöfUpp 32, no.4);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 146ra-158rb (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8)

msItem.note: The text divided into the portions according to the days of the week; incipits of the portions are rubricated.

msItem.title: III) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy “Song of Songs”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Two lines on the incipit page of Text I-1; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page of Text I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 154r, l.6: መኀልየ፡ መኀልይ፡ ዘውእቱ፡ ዘሰሎሞን።
msItem.explicit: Fol. 162v, l.11: ጕይ፡ አንተ፡ ወልድ፡ እኁየ፡ ወተመሰላ፡ ለወይጠል፨ ወእመአኮ፡ ከመ፡ ወሬዛ፡ ሀየል፨ ውስተ፡ አድባር፡ ድሑሐን፨

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 212v-227r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 139r-146r (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8)

msItem.note: Each strophe of the text is preceeded by a doxology written in red: ስብሐት፡ ለአብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ።

msItem.title: II) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Two lines on the incipit page of Text I-1; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page of Text I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 139r: መኀልየ፡ ዘነቢያት፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ለሙሴ። ፩። ንሴብሖ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ስቡሐ፡ ዘተሰብሐ፨ ፈረሰ፡ ወመስተጽዕነ፡ ወረወ፡ ውስተ፡ ባሕር፨

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 193v-212r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 126r-138v (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8)

msItem.note: First Song of Moses (Ex. 15:1–19): fols. 133r-140r; Second Song of Moses (Deut. 32:1–21): fols. 140r-141v; Third Song of Moses (Deut. 32:22–43): fols. 141v-143v; Song of Hannah (I Sam. 2:1–10): fols. 143v-144v; Prayer of Hezekiah (Is. 38:10–20): fols. 144v-145v; Prayer of Manasseh (apocryphal): fols. 145v-146v; Song of Jonah (Jon. 2:3–10): fols. 146v-147r; First Song of the Three Youths in the Furnace (Dan. 3:26–45): fols. 147r-148r; Second Song of the Three Youths (Dan. 3:52–56): fols. 148r-148v; Third Song of the Three Youths (Dan. 3:57–88): fols. 148v-150r; Song of Habakkuk (Hab. 3:1–19): fols. 150r-151v; Song of Isaiah (Is. 26:9–20): fols. 152r-152v; Song of Our Lady Mary (Lk. 1:46–55): fols. 152v-153r; Song of Zachariah (Lk. 1:68–79): fols. 153r-153v; Song of Simeon (Lk. 2:29–32): fols. 153v-154r.

Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.

msItem.title: I) Mäzmurä Dawit "Psalms of David"
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra ( name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3, I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; doxology at the end of each Song; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Two lines on the incipit page of Text I-1; a few lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page of Text I-4.
msItem.explicit: Fol. 138v, l.13: ወአንሰ፡ ነሣእኩ፡ ዘእምላዕሌሁ፡ ሰይፈ፨ ወመተርኩ፡ ርእሶ፨ ወአሰሰልኩ፡ ጽእለተ፡ እምደቂቁ፡ እስራኤል፨Ps. 151

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop.1 (16th cent.), fols. 1r-193r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 4r-126r (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8)

list.item:
8
XXII(8/fols. 170r-177v).
Fols. 178 and 179, have been extracted from their proper places (fol. 178 should follow fol. 131v; fol. 179 should follow fol. 125v) and attached to the back of quire XXII.

supportDesc.condition: The front board is broken and repaired with a cord and with leather strips; the back board is missing. At least one fol. is missing, between fols. 59 and 60 (containing a part of Ps. 66 ans Ps. 67). Fols. 178 and 179 are misplaced: fol. 178 should follow fol. 131v; fol. 179 should follow fol. 125v. Fol. 53 is placed in the reversed position. Many fols. are stained with wax and some are stained with water. The edges of many fols. are uneven.

layout.ab: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 13r.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 165r.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: II. Nine dot asterisk; four dot asterisks (in red, for the titles of the Psalms)
III. Chain of black and red dots (fols. 5r; 12r; 20v; 29r; 40r; 49r; 55v; 64v; 77v; 87r; 94r; 113v; 122v; 178v; 179r);
two chains of black and red dots (fols. 93v; 138v);
two chains of black and red dots with three nine dot asterisks between them (fol. 162v);
two or three nine dot asterisks (at the end of each daily portion of Wǝddase Maryam);
three nine dot asterisks with a chain of black and red dots beneath them (fol. 154r).
In the left margin the sign ፼ is consistently written throughout the Psalter and the Canticles of the Prophets, in front of each tenth to fourteenth line.

item.locus: Fols. 1va-3rb: Hymn to St. Mary Bǝḍǝˁǝt ˀanti… “Blessed you are…”, incomplete.
item.q: Fol. 1va, l.4: ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ብፅዕት፡ አንቲ፡ ወንግሥተ፡ ጽድቅ፡ ዘትሜንኒ፡ ማርያም፡ መንበረ፡ ሥላት። ... [fol. 3rb, l.19] ማርያም፡ አስምዒ፡ ለኃይለኪ[sic]፡ ድምጾ፡ ለፀረ፡ አርዌ፡ ዘየዓቅፆ፨ እስመ፡ አብዝኃ፡ ትዕግልተ፡ ወአመፆ ፨፨፨

item.locus: Fols. 3va-4rb: Sǝbḥatä fǝqur zä-Giyorgis “Praise of the Beloved St. George”.

list.item: - The Pss. are divided into groups of ten separated by a line of alternating black and red dots. - The scribe reduced the size of his handwriting to accommodate the whole line or the end of the line: fols. 29r, 61r, 73v, 75r, 79v, 88v, 91r, 96r, 115r, 123r. - Ethiopic numerals ፻፻ are written beside a verse of a Ps. or a Canticle on fols. 6r-153r. - Omitted letters and words written interlineally, in a secondary hand: fols. 9r, 133v, 136r, 160v, 161r, 162r. - Corrections written over erasures, in the main hand and in a secondary hand: fols. 7r, 66v, 69v, 72r, 99r, 100r, 101r, 115r, 127v, 128r, 131r, 145r, 146v, 153r, 153v, 165rb, 165vb, 171rb, 171vab, 175vb, 177ra. - Erasures marked with thin lines: fols. 127v, 152r, 163v, 165rb, 165va, 167rb, 172ra, 173vab, 174vb. - Scribbles: 1r, 3r.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards (the front board is broken and repaired; the back board is missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Some quires are reinforced by parchment guards (s. fols. 12v; 118r; 125v; 132r; 140r-147v; 156r-163v).

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: Names of Fasilädäs (fols. 12r, 29r, 93v, 108v, 138v), Gäbrä Ḥǝywät (fols. 55v, 93v, 138v), ʾabunä Wäldä Śǝllase (fols. 93v, 138v, 179r), Wäldä Gärima (fol. 138v) are written in the supplication formulas added by a secondary crude hand, the same which wrote the names of the days of the week.

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
